headline: Invesco Sells intelliflo to Carlyle; U.S. Division to Spin Off as RedBlack
summary: The Carlyle Group’s purchase includes intelliflo’s practice management software in the U.K. and U.S.-based subsidiaries, including investment management provider RedBlack, which will spin off as its own brand.

headline: Bitcoin ETFs post $219 million rebound while Ethereum funds attract twice the inflows
summary: Spot Bitcoin ETFs in the United States ended a difficult run of redemptions with their first day of inflows in more than a week. According to Coinperps data, the products collectively drew $219 million on Aug. 25, marking a shift in investor sentiment after six consecutive trading sessions of withdrawals. This rebound was led by […] The post Bitcoin ETFs post $219 million rebound while Ethereum funds attract twice the inflows appeared first on CryptoSlate.

headline: Carlyle to Acquire intelliflo from Invesco
summary: Global investment firm Carlyle (NASDAQ: CG) and Invesco (NYSE: IVZ), a leading global asset management firm, announced today an agreement for Carlyle to acquire intelliflo from Invesco. intelliflo is a market leading provider of cloud-based practice management software for independent financial advisors (IFAs) in the UK. The transaction includes intelliflo's US-based subsidiaries, including RedBlack, a provider of SaaS-based portfolio rebalancing tools, and intelliflo Portfolio, a Portfolio Mana
